description: Give an enemy unit <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy unit Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani
name: Caught in the Cold
